entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron explained how he had watched Harry jump into the pool and had waited for him to resurface; how he had realized that something was wrong, dived in, and saved Harry, then returned for the sword.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Ron explained how he had watched Harry jump into the pool and had waited for him to resurface; how he had realized that something was wrong, dived in, and saved Harry, then returned for the sword.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Deciding that it was at last safe to do so, Harry removed the Shield Charm with a wave of Hermione’s wand

entities.name: snatchers
entities.description: “Did you just say you got away from the Snatchers with a spare wand?”
